description: Audit trail for the patient's first contact provider.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item identifies the provider who was designated as the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter treatment team. The item is only populated for assignments from the patient's encounter  care team.

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_USER_ID
columns.description: This item identifies the user who was designated as the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter treatment team. The item is only populated for assignments from the On-Call schedule.

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_TRTMNT_TEAM_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item identifies the role of the provider who was designated as the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter treatment team.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This item identifies the update time of the provider who was designated as  the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter  treatment team. This corresponds to the time the first call was  referenced for use (by the system or display to an end user) and not  necessarily the time at which the patient's first call provider's  assignment was updated.

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item identifies the update reason for the provider who was designated as the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter treatment team.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Automatic - On-Call Covering


Automatic - Team Role


Automatic - Team Contact

columns.name: FIRST_CALL_CHNG_USER_ID
columns.description: This item identifies the update user for the provider who was designated as the patient's first call following a change in coverage for the encounter treatment team.
